81 template <typename D>
82 class DIIS {
83  public:
84  typedef typename D::element_type value_type;
85  typedef typename detail::scalar_t<value_type> scalar_type;
86  typedef Eigen::Matrix<value_type, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic,
87  Eigen::RowMajor>
88  EigenMatrixX;
89  typedef Eigen::Matrix<value_type, Eigen::Dynamic, 1> EigenVectorX;
90 
92 
115  DIIS(unsigned int strt = 1, unsigned int ndi = 5, scalar_type dmp = 0,
116  unsigned int ngr = 1, unsigned int ngrdiis = 1, scalar_type mf = 0,
117  scalar_type adt = 0)
118  : error_(0),
119  errorset_(false),
120  start(strt),
121  ndiis(ndi),
122  iter(0),
123  ngroup(ngr),
124  ngroupdiis(ngrdiis),
125  damping_factor(dmp),
126  mixing_fraction(mf),
127  attenuated_damping_threshold(adt) {
128  init();
129  }
130  ~DIIS() {
131  x_.clear();
132  errors_.clear();
133  x_extrap_.clear();
134  }
135 
143  void extrapolate(D& x, D& error, bool extrapolate_error = false) {
144  iter++;
145 
146  // compute extrapolation coefficients C_ and number of skipped vectors
147  // nskip_
148  compute_extrapolation_parameters(error);
149 
150  // extrapolate x using above computed parameters (C_ and nskip_)
151  extrapolate(x, C_, nskip_);
152 
153  const unsigned int nvec = errors_.size();
154 
155  // sizes of the x set and the error set should equal, otherwise throw
156  TA_USER_ASSERT(x_.size() == errors_.size(),
157  "DIIS: numbers of guess and error vectors do not match, "
158  "likely due to a programming error");
159 
160  // extrapolate the error if needed
161  if (extrapolate_error && (mixing_fraction == 0.0 || x_extrap_.empty())) {
162  for (unsigned int k = nskip_, kk = 1; k < nvec; ++k, ++kk) {
163  axpy(error, C_[kk], errors_[k]);
164  }
165  }
166  }
167 
176  void extrapolate(D& x, const EigenVectorX& c, unsigned int nskip = 0,
177  bool increase_iter = false) {
178  if (increase_iter) {
179  iter++;
180  }
181 
182  const bool do_mixing = (mixing_fraction != 0.0);
183 
184  // if have ndiis vectors
185  if (x_.size() ==
186  ndiis) { // holding max # of vectors already? drop the least recent x
187  x_.pop_front();
188  if (not x_extrap_.empty()) x_extrap_.pop_front();
189  }
190 
191  // push x to the set
192  x_.push_back(x);
193 
194  if (iter == 1) { // the first iteration
195  if (not x_extrap_.empty() && do_mixing) {
196  zero(x);
197  axpy(x, (1.0 - mixing_fraction), x_[0]);
198  axpy(x, mixing_fraction, x_extrap_[0]);
199  }
200  } else if (iter > start && (((iter - start) % ngroup) <
201  ngroupdiis)) { // not the first iteration and
202  // need to extrapolate?
203 
204  const unsigned int nvec = x_.size();
205  const unsigned int rank = nvec - nskip + 1; // size of coefficients
206 
207  TA_USER_ASSERT(c.size() == rank,
208  "DIIS: numbers of coefficients and x's do not match");
209  zero(x);
210  for (unsigned int k = nskip, kk = 1; k < nvec; ++k, ++kk) {
211  if (not do_mixing || x_extrap_.empty()) {
212  // std::cout << "contrib " << k << " c=" << c[kk] << ":" << std::endl
213  // << x_[k] << std::endl;
214  axpy(x, c[kk], x_[k]);
215  } else {
216  axpy(x, c[kk] * (1.0 - mixing_fraction), x_[k]);
217  axpy(x, c[kk] * mixing_fraction, x_extrap_[k]);
218  }
219  }
220 
221  } // do DIIS
222 
223  // only need to keep extrapolated x if doing mixing
224  if (do_mixing) x_extrap_.push_back(x);
225  }
226 
232  void compute_extrapolation_parameters(const D& error,
233  bool increase_iter = false) {
234  if (increase_iter) {
235  iter++;
236  }
237 
238  // if have ndiis vectors
239  if (errors_.size() == ndiis) { // holding max # of vectors already? drop
240  // the least recent error
241  errors_.pop_front();
242  EigenMatrixX Bcrop = B_.bottomRightCorner(ndiis - 1, ndiis - 1);
243  Bcrop.conservativeResize(ndiis, ndiis);
244  B_ = Bcrop;
245  }
246 
247  // push error to the set
248  errors_.push_back(error);
249  const unsigned int nvec = errors_.size();
250 
251  // and compute the most recent elements of B, B(i,j) = <ei|ej>
252  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nvec - 1; i++)
253  B_(i, nvec - 1) = B_(nvec - 1, i) =
254  dot_product(errors_[i], errors_[nvec - 1]);
255  B_(nvec - 1, nvec - 1) = dot_product(errors_[nvec - 1], errors_[nvec - 1]);
256  using std::abs;
257  using std::sqrt;
258  const auto current_error_2norm = sqrt(abs(B_(nvec - 1, nvec - 1)));
259 
260  const scalar_type zero_determinant = 1.0e-15;
261  const scalar_type zero_norm = 1.0e-10;
262  const auto current_damping_factor =
263  attenuated_damping_threshold > 0 &&
264  current_error_2norm < attenuated_damping_threshold
265  ? damping_factor *
266  (current_error_2norm / attenuated_damping_threshold)
267  : damping_factor;
268  const scalar_type scale = 1.0 + current_damping_factor;
269 
270  // compute extrapolation coefficients C_ and number of skipped vectors
271  // nskip_
272  if (iter > start &&
273  (((iter - start) % ngroup) <
274  ngroupdiis)) { // not the first iteration and need to extrapolate?
275 
276  scalar_type absdetA;
277  nskip_ = 0; // how many oldest vectors to skip for the sake of
278  // conditioning? try zero
279  do {
280  const unsigned int rank = nvec - nskip_ + 1; // size of matrix A
281 
282  // set up the DIIS linear system: A c = rhs
283  EigenMatrixX A(rank, rank);
284  C_.resize(rank);
285 
286  A.col(0).setConstant(-1.0);
287  A.row(0).setConstant(-1.0);
288  A(0, 0) = 0.0;
289  EigenVectorX rhs = EigenVectorX::Zero(rank);
290  rhs[0] = -1.0;
291 
292  scalar_type norm = 1.0;
293  if (std::abs(B_(nskip_, nskip_)) > zero_norm)
294  norm = 1.0 / std::abs(B_(nskip_, nskip_));
295 
296  A.block(1, 1, rank - 1, rank - 1) =
297  B_.block(nskip_, nskip_, rank - 1, rank - 1) * norm;
298  A.diagonal() *= scale;
299  // for (unsigned int i=1; i < rank ; i++) {
300  // for (unsigned int j=1; j <= i ; j++) {
301  // A(i, j) = A(j, i) = B_(i+nskip-1, j+nskip-1) * norm;
302  // if (i==j) A(i, j) *= scale;
303  // }
304  //}
305 
306 #if 0
307  std::cout << "DIIS: iter=" << iter << " nskip=" << nskip << " nvec=" << nvec << std::endl;
308  std::cout << "DIIS: B=" << B_ << std::endl;
309  std::cout << "DIIS: A=" << A << std::endl;
310  std::cout << "DIIS: rhs=" << rhs << std::endl;
311 #endif
312 
313  // finally, solve the DIIS linear system
314  Eigen::ColPivHouseholderQR<EigenMatrixX> A_QR = A.colPivHouseholderQr();
315  C_ = A_QR.solve(rhs);
316  absdetA = A_QR.absDeterminant();
317 
318  // std::cout << "DIIS: |A|=" << absdetA << " sol=" << c << std::endl;
319 
320  ++nskip_;
321 
322  } while (absdetA < zero_determinant &&
323  nskip_ < nvec); // while (system is poorly conditioned)
324 
325  // failed?
326  if (absdetA < zero_determinant) {
327  std::ostringstream oss;
328  oss << "DIIS::extrapolate: poorly-conditioned system, |A| = "
329  << absdetA;
330  throw std::domain_error(oss.str());
331  }
332  --nskip_; // undo the last ++ :-(
333 
334  parameters_computed_ = true;
335  }
336  }
337 
341  void start_extrapolation() {
342  if (start > iter) start = iter + 1;
343  }
344 
345  void reinitialize(const D* data = 0) {
346  iter = 0;
347  if (data) {
348  const bool do_mixing = (mixing_fraction != 0.0);
349  if (do_mixing) x_extrap_.push_front(*data);
350  }
351  }
352 
354  const EigenVectorX& get_coeffs() {
355  TA_USER_ASSERT(
356  parameters_computed_ && C_.size() > 0,
357  "DIIS: empty coefficients, because they have not been computed");
358  return C_;
359  }
360 
362  unsigned int get_nskip() { return nskip_; }
363 
366  bool parameters_computed() { return parameters_computed_; }
367 
368  private:
369  scalar_type error_;
370  bool errorset_;
371 
372  unsigned int start;
373  unsigned int ndiis;
374  unsigned int iter;
375  unsigned int ngroup;
376  unsigned int ngroupdiis;
377  scalar_type damping_factor;
378  scalar_type mixing_fraction;
379  scalar_type attenuated_damping_threshold;
380 
383  EigenMatrixX B_;
384  EigenVectorX C_;
385  bool parameters_computed_;
386  unsigned int nskip_;
388 
389  std::deque<D>
390  x_;
391  std::deque<D> errors_;
392  std::deque<D> x_extrap_;
393 
394  void set_error(scalar_type e) {
395  error_ = e;
396  errorset_ = true;
397  }
398  scalar_type error() { return error_; }
399 
400  void init() {
401  iter = 0;
402 
403  B_ = EigenMatrixX::Zero(ndiis, ndiis);
404  C_.resize(0);
405  parameters_computed_ = false;
406  nskip_ = 0;
407 
408  x_.clear();
409  errors_.clear();
410  x_extrap_.clear();
411  // x_.resize(ndiis);
412  // errors_.resize(ndiis);
413  // x_extrap_ is bigger than the other because
414  // it must hold data associated with the next iteration
415  // x_extrap_.resize(diis+1);
416  }
417 
418 }; // class DIIS
419 
420 } // namespace TiledArray
